items.title: Faroe Islands part-timers 'riding wave' for World Cup dream

items.title: I think about diabetes 'every five minutes' - Slade

items.title: Coventry's Lampard named manager of the month

items.title: NI focus on the 'here and now' in World Cup effort
items.summary: Northern Ireland manager Michael O'Neill says he has not thought about the possibility of reaching a World Cup play-off via their Nations League ranking rather than through the qualifying group.

items.title: NI focus on the 'here and now' in World Cup effort

items.title: 'If Kane were to get injured, where would that leave England?'
items.summary: Former England strikers Wayne Rooney and Emile Heskey join Kelly Somers and Kae Kurd to discuss England's over-reliance on Harry Kane and the alternative options at number nine.

items.title: Asus ROG Phone 9 and Zenfone 12 Ultra receive Android 16 update
items.summary: Asus launched its Android 16 beta program for the Zenfone 12 Ultra back in August, and after almost exactly three months of testing, it's now finally ready to roll out the finalized version. It's not just rolling out to the Zenfone 12 Ultra, but also the ROG Phone 9. The new build is 36.0810.1810.4â€¦

items.title: Apple is now set to receive 15% from WeChat apps and games purchases on iOS
items.summary: WeChat is the only app a Chinese person needs in China, since it also includes 'mini' apps and games inside. But this has long posed a problem for Apple. While the company takes a fee for every app and game purchase made through its App Store, these WeChat apps and games didn't go through the App Sâ€¦

items.title: Google's agentic AI now buys things for you and even calls stores to see what's in stock
items.summary: The AI revolution shows no signs of slowing down, and today Google is announcing some new features that, only a few short years ago, would have sounded like Sci-Fi. First, Google's agentic AI can now call stores on your behalf to ask what's in stock. This is available when you search for certain prâ€¦

items.title: Poco F8 Ultra runs Geekbench as its launch nears
items.summary: The Poco F8 Ultra and the Poco F8 Pro might be launching quite soon, much earlier than their predecessors' one-year anniversary in March. While the brand hasn't made an official announcement on the matter, we say this because both devices have already started doing the certifications dance across tâ€¦

items.title: nubia S2R with a single rear camera surfaces online
items.summary: nubia recently unveiled the V80 Design in certain global markets and it looks like the brand could launch another phone soon called the nubia S2R. Prominent leakster Evan Blass has shared images of the nubia S2R, which appears to be a budget handset. The back of the phone features a single rear camâ€¦

items.title: What insiders anonymously think about the AI race
items.summary: This is an excerpt of Sources by Alex Heath, a newsletter about AI and the tech industry, syndicated just for The Verge subscribers once a week. I spent yesterday at Eric Newcomer's Cerebral Valley conference in San Francisco, which is now in its third year. I've attended this event for three yearsâ€¦

Today there's already a rumor about the X500 series expected next year, possibly also in October (vivo is likely skipping X400 due to tetraphobia in some parts of Asiaâ€¦

items.title: 'Maybe I got in Ronaldo's head' - managers react to Portugal star's red

items.title: Valve wants Half-Life: Alyx to work well standalone on Steam Frame
items.summary: When I tried Half-Life: Alyx streaming from a PC to Valveâ€™s new Steam Frame VR headset, I was blown away; thanks to the Frameâ€™s dedicated wireless adapter and a cool trick Valve calls â€œfoveated streaming,â€ I didnâ€™t detect any latency as I explored an industrial building and fought some head crabs. â€¦

items.title: Philips smartphones and tablets are coming, specs leak for one of the first
items.summary: India's smartphone and tablet market is getting ready to welcome a new player, Philips. Of course, this is a local company (Zenotel) that purchased the rights to the Philips name. It's been teasing a launch for a few weeks now, and today specs for one of the first Philips devices have been leaked. â€¦

items.title: Apple will take a mini commission from mini app developers
items.summary: Apple is launching a new program for mini app developers that slashes its fees for in-app purchases. On Thursday, the company announced that mini app creators who join the program take advantage of a lower 15 percent commission rate â€” half of the up to 30 percent rate Apple charges other developersâ€¦

items.title: Huawei Mate 80 Pro+ may feature dual periscope cameras
items.summary: The Huawei Mate 80 series is expected to launch in China soon, and leaks continue to surface ahead of the announcement. While earlier reports hinted at a redesigned rear camera module, a new rumor now sheds light on the camera specifications of the Mate 80 Pro+. In a post on Weibo, tipster DCS noteâ€¦

items.title: JP Morgan says Nvidia is gearing up to sell entire AI servers instead of just AI GPUs and components â€” Jensen's master plan of vertical integration will boost Nvidia profits, purportedly starting with Vera Rubin
items.summary: Nvidia's Vera Rubin platform may upend the AI-server market by shipping partners fully built L10 compute trays that include all compute, power, and cooling hardware, leaving OEMs and ODMs to handle only rack integration while Nvidia takes over the core server design, much of the value, and margins.
